name: Articuno
flavorText:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear to doomed people who
are lost in icy
mountains.

previous.name: Snorlax
previous.flavorText:
Very lazy. Just
eats and sleeps.
As its rotund bulk builds, it
becomes steadily
more slothful.

next.name: Zapdos
next.flavorText:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear from clouds while
dropping enormous
lightning bolts.
